application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Prior approval for proposed telecommunications installation comprising a 18m Phase 8 Monopole C/W wrapround Cabinet at base and associated ancillary works adjacent to 61 & 63 Tewkesbury Gardens (Part 16 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and is in accordance with the Electronic Communications Code (as amended))
